languages.text: "Тебя ослепила гордыня, Паскаль. Так начинаются великие ереси — человек отвергает канон и заменяет веру в Него верой в себя".
"You have been blinded by pride, Pasqal. This is how great heresies begin — a person rejects the canon and abandons faith in Him for faith in themselves."
languages.original_text: "Тебя ослепила гордыня, Паскаль. Так начинаются великие ереси — человек отвергает канон и заменяет веру в Него верой в себя".

traits.locale_text: "You have been blinded by pride, Pasqal. This is how great heresies begin — a person rejects the canon and abandons faith in Him for faith in themselves."
"You have been blinded by pride, Pasqal. This is how great heresies begin — a person rejects the canon and abandons faith in Him for faith in themselves."
"You have been blinded by pride, Pasqal. This is how great heresies begin — a person rejects the canon and abandons faith in Him for faith in themselves."
"You have been blinded by pride, Pasqal. This is how great heresies begin — a person rejects the canon and abandons faith in Him for faith in themselves."

languages.text: “你被骄傲蒙蔽了双眼，帕斯卡，可怕的异端言说就是这样开始的。那些人拒绝了圣典，放弃了对帝皇的信仰，只为了把他们自己当成新的信仰。”
languages.original_text: "You have been blinded by pride, Pasqal. This is how great heresies begin — a person rejects the canon and abandons faith in Him for faith in themselves."

traits.locale_text: “你被骄傲蒙蔽了双眼，帕斯卡，可怕的异端言说就是这样开始的。那些人拒绝了圣典，放弃了对帝皇的信仰，只为了把他们自己当成新的信仰。”

languages.text: « Vous êtes aveuglé par l'orgueil, Pasqal. Vous qui rejetez désormais les règles et avez abandonné toute foi en l'Empereur ou en vous-même... C'est sur la voie de l'hérésie ultime que vous vous êtes engagé. »
languages.original_text: "You have been blinded by pride, Pasqal. This is how great heresies begin — a person rejects the canon and abandons faith in Him for faith in themselves."

traits.locale_text: « Vous êtes aveuglé par l'orgueil, Pasqal. Vous qui rejetez désormais les règles et avez abandonné toute foi en l'Empereur ou en vous-même... C'est sur la voie de l'hérésie ultime que vous vous êtes engagé. »

languages.text: «Le ciega el orgullo, Pasqal. Así han empezado las grandes herejías: alguien rechaza el canon y abandona la fe en el Emperador para creer solo en sí mismo».
languages.original_text: "You have been blinded by pride, Pasqal. This is how great heresies begin — a person rejects the canon and abandons faith in Him for faith in themselves."

traits.locale_text: «Le ciega el orgullo, Pasqal. Así han empezado las grandes herejías: alguien rechaza el canon y abandona la fe en el Emperador para creer solo en sí mismo».

languages.text: 「プライドのあまり盲目になっているな、パスカル。これは大きな異端の始まりだ…人は聖典を拒絶し皇帝への忠誠から生まれる信仰そのものを捨てる」
languages.original_text: "You have been blinded by pride, Pasqal. This is how great heresies begin — a person rejects the canon and abandons faith in Him for faith in themselves."

traits.locale_text: 「プライドのあまり盲目になっているな、パスカル。これは大きな異端の始まりだ…人は聖典を拒絶し皇帝への忠誠から生まれる信仰そのものを捨てる」

languages.text: "Ihr seid geblendet vom Stolz, Pasqal. So beginnt große Ketzerei — jemand widersagt der Lehre und ersetzt seinen Glauben an ihn durch einen Glauben an sich selbst."
languages.original_text: "You have been blinded by pride, Pasqal. This is how great heresies begin — a person rejects the canon and abandons faith in Him for faith in themselves."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr seid geblendet vom Stolz, Pasqal. So beginnt große Ketzerei — jemand widersagt der Lehre und ersetzt seinen Glauben an ihn durch einen Glauben an sich selbst."

languages.original_text: "You have been blinded by pride, Pasqal. This is how great heresies begin — a person rejects the canon and abandons faith in Him for faith in themselves."

languages.text: "Gurur gözünü kör etmiş Pasqal. Büyük kâfirlikler böyle başlar. Biri kutsal esasları reddeder ve kendine inandığı için O'na olan inancını kaybeder."
languages.original_text: "You have been blinded by pride, Pasqal. This is how great heresies begin — a person rejects the canon and abandons faith in Him for faith in themselves."

traits.locale_text: "Gurur gözünü kör etmiş Pasqal. Büyük kâfirlikler böyle başlar. Biri kutsal esasları reddeder ve kendine inandığı için O'na olan inancını kaybeder."
